function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Graphene derivatives with antimicrobial properties","Impact":"Potential false sense of security leading to lack of proper sanitation and disinfection measures","Mitigation":"Education about the limitations of graphene derivatives and the need for traditional sanitation measures","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Users of graphene derivatives, public health officials","Owner":"Public health organizations, regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Cytotoxicity of graphene derivatives due to negatively charged groups","Impact":"Potential harm to human and animal cells","Mitigation":"Testing and regulation of graphene derivatives, development of safer alternatives","Technologies":"Biocompatibility testing, regulatory oversight","People":"Researchers, manufacturers, regulatory bodies","Owner":"Regulatory bodies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Risk of promoting graphene derivatives as a primary solution for virus destruction","Impact":"Undermining the use of proven disinfection methods","Mitigation":"Promotion of graphene derivatives as a supplementary measure alongside traditional disinfection methods","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Public health officials, users of graphene derivatives","Owner":"Public health organizations, regulatory bodies"}]}
